tool_description: Searches for specific text content within files, supporting multiple search terms, regex patterns, and context extraction around matches.

file_paths.description: Array of file paths to search within

search_terms.description: Terms or patterns to search for within files

use_regex.description: Whether search terms are regular expressions

context_lines.description: Number of lines before/after match to include (0-10)

match_all_terms.description: Whether all search terms must be found in a file (AND vs OR)

file_types.description: File extensions to search in (e.g., txt, py, java)

max_file_size_mb.description: Maximum file size to search in MB (1-100)

encoding.description: Text encoding to use: utf-8, ascii, latin-1

error_messages: Empty file list: Provide at least one file path to search.
Empty search terms: Provide at least one search term.
Invalid regex pattern: One or more search terms contain invalid regex syntax.
Invalid context lines: Value must be between 0 and 10.
Invalid file size limit: max_file_size_mb must be between 1 and 100.
Invalid encoding: Use one of [utf-8, ascii, latin-1].
File read error: Cannot read one or more files due to permissions or encoding issues.
Binary file detected: File appears to be binary and cannot be searched as text.
usage: Provide file_paths and search_terms arrays. Configure regex usage, case sensitivity, context extraction, and other search options. Returns files containing matches with highlighted context.

matching_files.description: Array of file paths containing matching content

total_matches.description: Total number of matches found across all files

files_searched.description: Number of files that were successfully searched

search_summary.description: Summary of search results and match distribution
